tips.inpSmall: The input quantity is too small

airdrop.title: Gas station
airdrop.p: If the user successfully transfers assets from other blockchains to PSC, but the 1 psc airdrop has not arrived, the user can manually collect 1 PSC as the polysmartchain fuel fee.

bridge.tips: Your transaction address will become the collection address. Please switch the network to check your balance after completion.

orderPop.fromNetwork: network name of the conversion initiator
orderPop.toNetwork: converting the network name of the target
orderPop.tips0: initiating a transaction and waiting for currency transfer
orderPop.tips2: currency transfer succeeded, waiting for casting
orderPop.tips4: casting failed, waiting for capital return
orderPop.tips6: fund return failed, waiting for retry
orderPop.tips7: fund return failed, waiting for manual completion
orderPop.downOK: Confirm to close the current order?
orderPop.wxTips: Reminder: If you click the close order button after the transfer transaction has been sent, the cross-chain task will still run normally!

qrCode.upApp: Please open WDC app for code scanning payment
qrCode.no: Please don't scan the code randomly!

transContinue.title: Confirmation
transContinue.tip1: Only the first transfer will be monitored. Please start a single transfer.
transContinue.tip2: The network fee and final fee depend on market conditions. The final rate at the completion of the transaction may be different.

orderList.title: Order list
orderList.name: Name
orderList.status2: Successful currency conversion, waiting for casting
orderList.status4: Transaction failed, waiting for fund return
orderList.status6: Failed to return funds, wait for retry
orderList.status7: Failed to return funds, waiting for manual completion
orderList.status200: Successfully minted, coins have been put
